Medium: cotton
Technique: roller (mule) printed on plain weave
description: Piece of thin glazed chintz, printed by combination of roller and block or roller and "surface roller".  Yellow ground, pillar design in red with capitols in yellow, black and red; sides of pillars oramented with flower sprays in yellow, red and black.  In yellow field between flower clusters l f natural size, roses, pansies and columbines, with butterfly, in shades of red, sepia and yellow.
name: Textile
